thread.title: BRIEF-Nasdaq Announces End-Of-Month Open Short Interest Positions

title: BRIEF-Nasdaq Announces End-Of-Month Open Short Interest Positions
text: March 9, 2018 / 9:24 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Nasdaq Announces End-Of-Month Open Short Interest Positions Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 9 (Reuters) - Nasdaq Inc: * NASDAQ ANNOUNCES END-OF-MONTH OPEN SHORT INTEREST POSITIONS IN NASDAQ STOCKS AS OF SETTLEMENT DATE FEBRUARY 28, 2018 * NASDAQ INC - ‍AT END OF SETTLEMENT DATE OF FEB 28, 2018, SHORT INTEREST IN 2,345 NASDAQ GLOBAL MARKET SECURITIES TOTALED 7.05 BILLION SHARES​ * NASDAQ INC - ‍END-OF-FEBRUARY SHORT INTEREST REPRESENTS 3.72 DAYS AVERAGE DAILY NASDAQ GLOBAL MARKET SHARE VOLUME FOR REPORTING PERIOD​ * NASDAQ INC - ‍SHORT INTEREST IN 874 SECURITIES ON NASDAQ CAPITAL MARKETTOTALED 891.4 MILLION SHARES AT END OF SETTLEMENT DATE OF FEB 28, 2018​ * NASDAQ INC - SHORT INTEREST IN ALL 3,219 NASDAQ SECURITIES TOTALED 7.94 BILLION SHARES AT FEB 28, 2018 SETTLEMENT DATE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
